name: David Hasenjaeger
briefMessage: Full stack developer with {} years of experience working in an agile development model either on the front end with React, Angular, or Backbone or on the back end with Java or Node.js.

description.body: Worked in teams to make programs with Javascript every day
Learned full stack Javascript as well as PostgreSQL and MongoDB database languages
Made a simple puzzle game in a team of two using AngularJs as a final project
Wrote all handouts including pdfs of lecture notes
Lectured daily from the notes that I created
Created course materials with technical formatting and diagrams
Advised full time faculty on course content
Adapted curriculum to emphasize analytical skills
Earned an MS in mathematics while teaching
Recognized as top mathematics student in 2011
Facilitated classroom discussions
Guided individual learning during small group work and in office hours

personalProjects.name: Code For PDX
personalProjects.title: An app for use by Clackamas County to monitor public health

projects.name: An app that will be used by Clackamas County for monitoring public health. It scrapes social media and identifies areas with high insidences of symptoms of Hepatitis A
projects.techsUsed: Javascript, Node.js, React, glamorous, webpack, git, bash

personalProjects.name: Color Wheel Graph
personalProjects.title: React app to graph complex functions using domain coloring

projects.name: A front end that leverages the Calculator App to graph complex functions. This was an app that I used as a visual aid during a talk on Taylor Series where I displayed the graphs of complex functions and their Taylor series using color wheel graphs (https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Domain_coloring).
projects.techsUsed: Javascript, Node.js, React, webpack, git, bash

personalProjects.name: Calculator App
personalProjects.title: Node.js program that can solve complex polynomial equations

projects.name: A calculator that I built to use Javascripts built in Math object to build a Polynomial object with methods for performing arithmetic on polynomials and finding complex number solutions for up to third order polynomials.
projects.techsUsed: Javascript, Node.js, git, bash, Jasmine (replaced with mocha), Mocha, Chai
